backend/main.mo: Defines task, content, and user profile types and manages user data with admin bootstrap, role assignment, and permission‑checked queries.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short summaries of many frontend files for documentation or planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers with light/dark theme variables using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes with auth‑gated pages and wraps the app in theme and layout providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminAccess: UI screen shown when admin access fails, including bootstrap admin action when enabled and principal copy utilities.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DailyC: Fetches and displays rotating daily content slides with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DailyO: Displays daily activity tiles by fetching a task for a date and showing completion status and summaries for each activity.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DailyP: Calculates and displays a progress bar showing how many of six daily activities are completed.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DateSe: Provides a popover date picker button allowing users to select a date.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Monthl: Renders an SVG line chart showing daily percentage progress across a month.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Shows a footer with attribution and a link to caffeine.ai including dynamic year and hostname.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Displays the app header with theme toggle, user menu, navigation links, and logout options.
Wraps the app layout with header, main content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/reports/Download: Provides UI to select a date range, fetch tasks, and download them as a CSV report.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeProvi: Manages theme state (light, dark, system) and applies resolved theme to the document.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Fasting: Allows users to record fasting status and notes for a selected date, syncing updates to the backend.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Murojaa: UI module for viewing and editing Murojaah tasks, including surah and verse range, with save functionality using backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Sedekah: Handles Sedekah task completion and triggers payment link flow, updating backend task status.
frontend/src/components/tracking/SholatM: Provides toggle controls for daily prayer completion and updates the sholat task via backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Tahfidz: UI for updating Tahfidz memorization tasks with surah and verse range fields and saving via backend.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Tilawah: Allows editing Tilawah reading tasks by surah and verse range and persists changes through backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Provides authentication state, role/admin queries, login/logout handling, and error retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendQueries.ts: Collection of react-query wrappers for backend operations including user profile, roles, admin actions, and task CRUD.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminGatePage.t: Handles admin access control, showing loading, error, denied, or admin panel states based on authentication and role checks.
Provides the admin dashboard with tabs for user management, content, statistics, and settings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DailyContentTab: Admin UI for viewing and editing daily Quran reflection, hadith, and motivational content, with backend persistence and preview.
frontend/src/pages/admin/SettingsTab.tsx: Provides a form to view and update the global sedekah payment link with backend syncing.
frontend/src/pages/admin/StatisticsTab.t: Displays date‑range‑based user participation stats, currently showing user count and placeholder progress metrics.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UserManagementT: Admin interface to list users and create new accounts using principal, name, and email via backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays the user dashboard with daily tracking modules, profile setup flow, date selection, progress, and data loading.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders a login screen that triggers authentication and redirects authenticated users to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/MonthlyProgressPage.t: Shows monthly task completion stats and charts by fetching tasks in a date range and allowing month navigation.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Generates CSV exports from task data, formatting dates and escaping fields safely.
frontend/src/utils/date.ts: Provides helpers for converting between dates and Unix timestamps and formatting dates.
frontend/src/utils/month.ts: Utility functions for month boundaries, day counts, labels, and listing days in a month.
frontend/src/utils/progress.ts: Computes task completion percentage based on six criteria including full wajib prayer completion.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validates surah verse ranges, ensuring required fields and correct numeric ordering.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended OKLCH-based color system, custom animations, and typography/container/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, features, issues, and architectural notes for the Ramadhan Tracker web app, including admin-only accounts, tracking modules, and known production problems.
